mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(email, name, password, phone, school_code, school_name, location_code, location_name) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{schoolCode}, #{schoolName}, #{locationCode}, #{locationName})
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*) >= 1, 1, 0) FROM MEMBER WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT IF(COUNT(*) >= 1, 1, 0) FROM MEMBER WHERE phone = #{phone}
